alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 12:48PM MDT until April 19 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds may gust over 40 mph at times near Livingston. * WHERE...Livingston Area, Northern Park, and Paradise Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...A combination of wet snow and strong winds is expected. This will be hazardous for young livestock and may also create difficult travel conditions. I-90 should stay mostly wet, except for Bozeman Pass which will likely become slushy this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley
